title: SMIMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Research Assistant and Other Posts
description: Surat Municipal Institute of Medical Education & Research (SMIMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Research Assistant and Field Investigator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, M.Sc, B.Sc Nursing, B.Pharm, B.Sc, BPH, MSW can grab this chance and apply for the SMIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for th...
